data.message: For some reason I can't post in any of my groups. The option just is not there. I can comment like here but I can not start a post. Any ideas why?

replies.message: Sorry to hear this, Maggie. Facebook has policies in place to stop behavior that other people may find annoying or abusive: http://bit.ly/2vpUpL2. Unfortunately we can't lift your temporary block for any reason. In the meantime, we suggest that you review our Community Standards: http://bit.ly/2wfPkCM. If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2ff7gcN. -Ashley
I was not blocked as it worked on my phone. It was a FB issue and is working again now
